studentTagline.html: We are actively recruiting students to join our project teams and committees for Fall 2022!
studentTagline.inlineHtml: We are actively recruiting students to join our project teams and committees for Fall 2022!

nonprofitTagline.html: We build software, websites, and mobile apps to turn your ideas into real products.
nonprofitTagline.inlineHtml: We build software, websites, and mobile apps to turn your ideas into real products.

nonprofitSection.html:
If you have an existing project or a team, we are happy to get involved in your development cycle.

We'll get in touch to understand your needs and figure out how we can help. Contact us here for any questions you have in mind that were not answered in the application!
nonprofitSection.inlineHtml: If you have an existing project or a team, we are happy to get involved in your development cycle.We'll get in touch to understand your needs and figure out how we can help. Contact us here for any questions you have in mind that were not answered in the application!

footerText.html: Reach out to hello@bitsofgood.org for any questions. Subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated!
